Name: Inert settings
Description: These don't actually do anything; they're here to test the config system.

Name: This is a paragraph. You can put a bunch of text here. Personally, I'd put some text about my cat here. He's super soft and fluffy.
Cat Rating
Description: How great is this cat, on a scale of 1 to 10? Note that values less than 10 might make me cry.

Name: Pi count
Description: How much pi do you want? No, I don't mean pie.

Name: Comments
Description: Some comments about how you enjoyed this config section. No, this isn't a survey. I'm just bored.

Name: Go to actual settings
Description: Go to some settings actually used in this example pack.

Name: Mysterious Circle Universal Gift Taste
Description: The amount of friendship points the Mysterious Circle will give.

Name: Animated Mysterious Circle
Description: Whether or not the mysterious circle is animated.

Name: Static Mysterious Circle Color
Description: The color of the mysterious circle if it isn't animated.

Name: JA Legacy Enabled
Description: Whether or not the JA legacy example data (converted using the converter) is enabled.
